scripts.test:backend: bun run script/env.ts test -- cargo test --test integration_test -- --ignored
scripts.test:e2e: bun run script/env.ts test --with-frontend -- bun --cwd frontend test:e2e
scripts.test:all: bun run test:unit && bun run test:e2e
scripts.deploy:frontend: cd frontend && bun run build && wrangler pages deploy dist --project-name=binary-markets
scripts.install:all: cd backend && cargo fetch && cd ../frontend && bun install && cd ../script && bun install
scripts.build: cd backend && cargo build --release && cd ../frontend && bun run build
scripts.lint: cd backend && cargo clippy && cd ../frontend && bun run lint
scripts.clean: cd backend && cargo clean && cd ../frontend && rm -rf dist node_modules/.vite
